Things you plan to investigate using this dataset:

- Thing 1: If birth date has any correlation to the position they play
- Thing 2: If province born has a relation to what division or conference they play in
- Thing 3: Look to see if birth date is related to what number the players wear

Stat 251 topics you plan to cover during the analysis:

1. Topic 1 - Using lubridate to organize dates and analyze days of week and such 
2. Topic 2 - joins, being able to join players to their team dataset
3. Topic 3 - Creating plots 
4. Topic 4 - Creating a map based on province and amount of players from there
